text: thumb Moinot Ghat (also known as Mini Cox's Bazar) is a tourist attraction in Dohar Upazila of Dhaka. == Location == Mainot Ghat is a place in Doha upazila of Dhaka District. Across the river Bhadrasan of Faridpur on the river. ==References== Category:Tourist attractions in Dhaka
title: Moinot Ghat
